mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (userid, password, email, name, phone) VALUES (#{userid}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT userid, password, email, name, phone FROM member WHERE userid=#{userid}
SELECT userid, password, email, name, phone FROM member
SELECT a.username, a.email, b.sns_id, b.sns_type, b.sns_name, b.sns_email FROM member a, sns_info b WHERE a.id = b.id AND b.sns_id = #{snsId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sns_info (sns_id, sns_type, sns_name, sns_email) VALUES (#{snsId}, #{snsType}, #{snsName}, #{snsEmail})
